comment:
* An event reported to a supplied [IntentSender] by the system chooser when an activity is selected
 * or other actions are taken to complete the session.
 *
 * @see Intent#EXTRA_CHOOSER_RESULT_INTENT_SENDER

variables.name: SEND_CHOOSER_RESULT
variables.comment:
* Controls whether to send ChooserResult to the optional IntentSender supplied to the Chooser. *

* When enabled, ChooserResult is added to the provided Intent as * {@link Intent#EXTRA_CHOOSER_RESULT}, and sent for actions such as copy and edit, in addition * to activity selection. When disabled, only the selected component * is provided in {@link Intent#EXTRA_CHOSEN_COMPONENT}. *

* See: {@link Intent#createChooser(Intent, CharSequence, IntentSender)} * * @hide

variables.name: CHOOSER_RESULT_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: An unknown action was taken to complete the session.

variables.name: CHOOSER_RESULT_SELECTED_COMPONENT
variables.comment: The session was completed by selecting an activity to launch.

variables.name: CHOOSER_RESULT_COPY
variables.comment: The session was completed by invoking the copy action.

variables.name: CHOOSER_RESULT_EDIT
variables.comment: The session was completed by invoking the edit action.

methods.name: public int getType()
methods.comment:
* The type of the result.
     *
     * @return the type of the result

methods.name: public ComponentName getSelectedComponent()
methods.comment:
* Provides the component of the Activity selected for results with type * when type is {@link ChooserResult#CHOOSER_RESULT_SELECTED_COMPONENT}. *

* For all other types, this value is null. * * @return the component name selected

methods.name: public boolean isShortcut()
methods.comment:
* Whether the selected component was provided by the app from as a shortcut.
     *
     * @return true if the selected component is a shortcut, false otherwise

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
